content: add a touch of elegance to any outfit with our stunning gateau cowl delicately knit with variegated yarn it s the perfect warm-weather accessory with row of stockinette garter and occasional lace it s perfect for confident beginners for the full version check our website stand out this season with the beautiful gateau cowl materials #4 worsted about 108 216 324 yards noro silk garden 45% silk 45% mohair 10% wool merino 108 yards shown in color #500 tools & notions us 8 - 24 24 32 circular needles stitch markers gauge 16 stitches = 4 in stockinette stitch take time to save time swatch and check your gauge before casting on finished measurements 6 tall x 22 circumference note finished measurements are given after blocking for more sizes the full version of this pattern is available here 1 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/gateau-3
